unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about the timeline of events in that crazy political drama we had last year, right? You know, the one with all the defections and the overnight swearing-in ceremony? It's kinda hard to keep track, so here's my attempt to lay it all out.
normalised: Okay, so someone asked about the timeline of events in that crazy political drama we had last year, right? You know, the one with all the defections and the overnight swearing-in ceremony? It's kind of hard to keep track, so here's my attempt to lay it all out.

unnormalised: It all kicked off on 05/03/2023. That's when rumors started swirling about some MLAs being unhappy with the current CM. Then, on 08 Mar, which was Holi, apparently, a bunch of them disappeared. Reports said they were holed up in a resort in Guwahati, of all places! Talk about getting away from it all, huh?
normalised: It all kicked off on the fifth of march two thousand and twenty three. That's when rumors started swirling about some M-L-As being unhappy with the current C-M. Then, on the eighth of march, which was Holi, apparently, a bunch of them disappeared. Reports said they were holed up in a resort in Guwahati, of all places! Talk about getting away from it all, huh?

unnormalised: By 10/03/2023, things were getting really heated. The opposition party filed a no-confidence motion. Everyone was glued to their TV sets, waiting to see what would happen. The assembly session was scheduled for 15/03/23, but the Speaker kept adjourning it. Classic delaying tactics, you know?
normalised: By the tenth of march two thousand and twenty three, things were getting really heated. The opposition party filed a no-confidence motion. Everyone was glued to their T-V sets, waiting to see what would happen. The assembly session was scheduled for the fifteenth of march two thousand and twenty three, but the Speaker kept adjourning it. Classic delaying tactics, you know?

unnormalised: Then came the real shocker. On 17th March '23, at around 2:30 AM, the Governor swore in a new CM! Overnight! Can you believe it? Social media went crazy. Memes everywhere. It was trending for days.
normalised: Then came the real shocker. On the seventeenth of March two thousand and twenty three, at around two thirty A-M, the Governor swore in a new C-M! Overnight! Can you believe it? Social media went crazy. Memes everywhere. It was trending for days.

unnormalised: The old CM gave a press conference later that day, around 10:00 AM IST, saying he was betrayed and that democracy was murdered. Dramatic, I know! The new CM, of course, said it was a victory for the people. Everyone’s got their own spin, don’t they?
normalised: The old C-M gave a press conference later that day, around ten A-M I-S-T, saying he was betrayed and that democracy was murdered. Dramatic, I know! The new C-M, of course, said it was a victory for the people. Everyone's got their own spin, don't they?

unnormalised: So, the new government had to prove its majority. The vote was held on 21/03/2023. They won, but only by a whisker. It was a close call.
normalised: So, the new government had to prove its majority. The vote was held on the twenty first of march two thousand and twenty three. They won, but only by a whisker. It was a close call.

unnormalised: Anyway, that's the gist of it. From the initial rumblings on 05/03 to the vote on 21/03 – a whirlwind of political maneuvering. I hope this clears things up. It was definitely a rollercoaster ride for the state, and it’s something we won’t forget anytime soon! Maybe Netflix will make a series about it someday. I’d watch it. What do you guys think?
